name: JustDrive XMas Special 2022
description:
Oh What Fun it is to Ride in a None-Horse Open Sleigh - Just drive around and have fun! 

Best Played with Arrow Keys and Left Ctrl to BOOST

Dont forget - Left CTRL to BOOST!!!

This pack is a mesh-up of some free assets. a little bit adjusted so they can be played together. resized, arranged added some rigidbodies, and so on.

Keyboard Controls

  • Brake - Arrow Key Down
  • Steering Left Right - Arrow Keys Left/Right
  • Throttle - Arrow Key Up
  • Drift - Y
  • Jump - Space
  • Boost - left ctrl

Game Controller Controls

  • Brake - Left Stick Down or Joypad Down
  • Steering Left Right - Left Stick or Joypad or L1/R1
  • Throttle - A
  • Drift - B
  • Jump - Y
  • Boost - X

tested with XboxOne Controller
